translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I have received the official letter from Your Lordship Electoral Table.

To be in agreement and to have nothing missing on the 8th (as is my wish), I beg Your Lordship Your Lordship Tax Office. The response from Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship São Lourenço, 26th of February, 1840. Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Chief General of Police. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu. President of the Primary Assembly.

Official letter from Dr. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu, President of the Primary Assembly, dated 26th of February, received on the 28th and answered on the same day. Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic To citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, Chief General of Police of Boqueirão. From citizen Dr. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu. Election of the Constituent Assembly.

To citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, Chief General of Police of Boqueirão. From citizen Dr. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu. Election of the Constituent Assembly.
